name: Float Sam
description:
In the darkest reaches of space, one man must embark on a mission to push smaller objects into larger ones.

New 'cheating in the Game Jam' edition! Has actual sound :D

Controls:
Thrust with W,

Turn with A and D,

Jump boost with Space for tricky spots.

Try to collect the four secret flags by knocking items into their proper place.
Remember your own goal is to gracefully orbit like a satellite. Blast around and you'll end up with egg on your face. Practice makes perfect, it's just a matter of time.
